body_html:
@ezyang Thanks, I did that but same error. The problem seems to be that I have multiple CUDA versions installed on my machine (have to) but python setup.py install is autodetecting the wrong version.

$ nvcc --version
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2016 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Tue_Jan_10_13:22:03_CST_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61

body:
@ezyang Thanks, I did that but same error.  The problem seems to be that I have multiple CUDA versions installed on my machine (have to) but `python setup.py install` is autodetecting the wrong version.

```
$ nvcc --version
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2016 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Tue_Jan_10_13:22:03_CST_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61
```
